title: Meet the Team - Wess Cason Realty

quotes: The Cason’s have lived in the Charlotte area for 18 years.
Licensed for 20 years in 3 states, he and Natalie have grown the business to include Buyer & Seller agency as well as a large Property Management division.
Born in Ukraine and raised in Seattle Washington Marina moved to the Charlotte area in 2019.
Married to a GC for 15 years Marina has the ideal foundation for buying and selling homes.
Over the course of 13 years she worked in the medical field and learned the value of commitment and care.
After getting married in 2006 she started a family with her husband Roman and had 3 children.
In 2020 Marina took her passion for homes to the real estate world where she joined Wess Cason Realty in Matthews NC.
Having lived, worked, and served in the Charlotte Metro area for 16+ years, Carolyn (and her family of 5) have seen the city grow and develop into one of the nation’s fastest growing cities.
